70010000066614.description:
Hunt the Night is a retro-style action-RPG that blends fast, skillful combat with dark fantasy lore. Play as Vesper, a member of the Stalkers, and traverse the ruined world of Medhram on a mission to save humanity from a deadly cycle of annihilation. Endure nightmarish overworlds, slash through horrific dungeons, face brutal bosses, and wield an arsenal of powers in a relentless struggle against the Night itself.

In the 9th Age, humanity is trapped in a vicious cycle on the verge of extinction. The day is ruled by humans, while the Night brings annihilation by horrid creatures. A group of humans called ‘The Stalkers’ once wielded power to hold back the horrors, but their sacrifice only delayed the inevitable.

Now, as the Night starts devouring every single glint of light, Vesper, a Stalker by right and daughter of a traitor, will travel a dying land trying to save the last embers of humanity. She hunts in a race against destiny, as the shadows lengthen both in the world and in her mind.

ENGAGE IN FAST-PACED DYNAMIC COMBAT
Dash through enemies while you unleash your combos, use your weapons or destroy them with your dark powers. You can switch between melee and ranged attack in quick succession: slashing enemies with your sword and then dashing away to use your ranged weapons, avoiding enemy attacks.

FACE INTENSE CHALLENGING BOSSES
Endure the ultimate challenge as you fight the ancient horrors of the Night that have been annihilating humanity over and over in intense boss battles. Learn their weak points, attack patterns and survive through the different combat phases as the battle gets more challenging and extreme.

UPGRADE AND CUSTOMIZE VESPER'S BUILD
Create your own build that will adapt not only to your preferred gameplay but also to particular bosses. Customize the upgrades of your arsenal and use the equipment that best suits your gameplay: Critical Damage, Life Steal, Poison, Close Combat, Firepower and more. Collect Sanguine vials, Crow Feathers, Moonstones and Noctilium to increase your stats and get ready to face the Night.

DISCOVER THE DARK WORLD OF MEDHRAM
Explore Medhram in a combination of action-adventure and dark fantasy lore. Survive huge dungeons full of traps, enemies, puzzles and challenges. Discover all kinds of locations, from ancient cathedrals and libraries of knowledge to lost kingdoms and devastated floating cities.

COMPLETE 'HUNTS' AS A MEMBER OF THE STALKERS
Accept a hunt at ‘Crow’s Nest’ and track down the dark beast, find where it hides and hunt the most powerful creatures of the Night. After every completed hunt you will get rewards that will increase your health and dark energy bar.

FIND SECONDARY CHARACTERS AND DISCOVER THEIR STORIES
Meet new characters and discover their tragic past and stories in a world that is on the brink of the abyss.

PLAY TO ADAPTED AND IMMERSIVE MUSIC
Immersive and adapted music to every moment, boss and location, with the collaboration of Hiroki Kikuta.
70010000066614.intro: Darkness never rests, and neither will you.
70010000066614.name: Hunt the Night

70010000099536.description:
A ruinous cataclysm unleashed by a tormented god descended the world of Talamhel into perpetual night. The hourglass of time was shattered and its essence poured across the land, creating an endless sea of sand. The once-flourishing world of Talamhel became a putrid lesion of its former glory and those who called it home are now husks of corruption--violent, undying, unyielding soldiers of death. 

But Talamhel is not lost--not yet. 

For generations, the righteous few have endured. You are one of those few. On the eve of your induction into the Order of Remnant Knights, the last protectors of man, Talamhel is once-again wracked by calamity. The corruptive nature of the Night Plague has mutated, and the realm of man needs the Remnant Knights more than ever. 

Track down the emergent evil and destroy it. Protect the realm of man. 

From the helm of your nimble grainwake, carve across the perilous sandseas to confront the source of this newfound terror, but don’t expect a guiding light or a red X on a map. You’ll chart your own course forward--behold the open seas, and choose the heading you best see fit. 

But familiarity is a far-flung concept aboard the grainwake--the shifting sands are always changing, revealing secrets, dangers, and paths unseen. Things are not as they seem… 
-Talamhel is an open world, free to explore and discover as you please. 
-Every island is a unique, colorful encounter of combat, lore, and plunder. 
-With tiered levels of difficulty, locations offer challenges that will reward those who overcome. 
-With a trusted (undead) companion rested in the crow’s nest, you’ll never sail the seas alone. 

The corruption that plagues Talamhel has created a horde comprised of both man and other Talamhelic natives: The venerable Ferrum and the insectoid, hive-minded Hashara. Once warring nations have become an abominable army of undying malice. 

From doomsday cultists to fallen kings, the foes that guard the answers you seek are determined to see your end. Prepare for an unrelenting, unforgiving combat experience not to be taken lightly. Swing true, dear knight, swing true. 

With hundreds of weapon components to be reclaimed from the crumbled remains of civilization, there are thousands of unique weapons to be forged. Find the hilt that fits just right. 
-Cleave through the corruption with 7 distinct fighting styles. 
-Bolster yourself with dozens of armor sets, each with their own unique defenses. 
-Combine and modify your devastation with magical augments, creating a personalized build.
70010000099536.intro: Sail across the sandseas to return life to a dying world in an unforgettable experience that is equal parts engaging story and unrelenting, souls-like combat.
70010000099536.name: Sands of Aura

70010000100614.description:
“Um, please be the new manager of the cafe!”
 Fuwa Fuwa Cafe—a maid cafe tucked away in a quiet part of Nipponbashi, and where a wonderful encounter is about to take place...
 You, the protagonist, quit your job at an extremely toxic workplace and find yourself at a run-down maid cafe, where a cute maid named Shiro works.
 At first, you only agree to become the new manager because it conveniently met all your urgent needs, but soon the colorful maids Miyu, Favna, and Honoka join in. And as you spend time with them and meet the people of Electric Street, both you and the cafe will gradually liven up once more.

 Maid Cafe on Electric Street is a game set in Nipponbashi, the heart of Osaka’s otaku culture. This is a story-focused adventure game where you enjoy daily life at Fuwa Fuwa Cafe. Make yourself a cup of coffee, relax, and immerse yourself in a heartwarming story.

 ■4 Cute, Memorable Heroines
Enjoy voice-acted conversations with the four maids, all with distinct personalities.
 ♥Shiro (VA: Ikumi Hasegawa)
 A maid who loves Fuwa Fuwa Cafe. A huge otaku for anime and video games, she talks really fast when she’s gushing about the things she loves, and often splurges on merch without thinking whenever she visits an anime shop. A little clumsy, but works hard every day to become the cute maid she’s always wanted to be.

 ♥Miyu (VA: Ayasa Itou)
 A game otaku and gyaru with a big appetite. Loves both eating and cooking, and apparently really enjoys serving her cooking to customers at Fuwa Fuwa Cafe. Is actually Shiro's friend on the online game Magic Angel, so they knew each other before actually meeting in real life.

 ♥Favna (VA: Sayumi Suzushiro)
 A mysterious girl dressed in gothic Lolita fashion. Speaks in riddles and demands the protagonist become her familiar. She sometimes accidentally drops the edgy act when she's taken by surprise though, so maybe she's just got a serious case of chuunibyou...?

 ♥Honoka (VA: Yui Ishikawa)
 A girl with a Kansaiben dialect who works as a shrine maiden at her family shrine. Practically in charge of the shrine, she is reliable and very good at handling money! Is actually a doujin author...?

 ■The Daily Life with the Four Maids of Fuwa Fuwa Cafe
 As the manager of Fuwa Fuwa, you’ll live in Nipponbashi, Osaka and spend time with your favorite maid... or maids. Go shopping, watch a movie, go for karaoke, buy a present for a special someone... What you choose to do, and with whom, will affect the ending of the story.

 ■Make Fuwa Fuwa Cafe Famous!
As the manager, it's your job to run the cafe. Improve the maids' work skills, optimize their roles, and drive up profits. The money you earn can be spent on shopping, food, capsule toys and more!

 ■The Stunning Sights of Nipponbashi
 Visit stores you can find in the real Nipponbashi, such as Surugaya, Sofmap, Dragon Star, Super Potato, and Karaoke Rainbow, among the many others we've collaborated with.
 Go shopping by yourself or go on dates with the maids and enjoy life in otaku heaven. But don't stay out too late; you still have a cafe to run!

 ■Collectable Capsule Toys
 In this game, you can try to collect your favorite capsule toy series and experience that unique gacha thrill of not knowing what you're getting. Keep cranking those machines until you've collected them all!

 Other than capsule toys, there's more merch for you to collect, like video games, books, and figures. You can also decorate your room and watch as your collections reach completion!
70010000100614.intro:
Fuwa Fuwa, a maid cafe on its last legs.
By a twist of fate, you've become the boss.
Now turn things around with four adorable maids!
70010000100614.name: Maid Cafe on Electric Street

70010000104061.description:
Dive into the past. Re-examine a murder.

A famous artist was brutally murdered thirty years ago. There were irregularities, the primary suspect died, and the case was closed.

Now you must revisit the scene of the crime. Uncover new clues, investigate additional suspects, and reveal the truth. All while keeping your mysterious time travel powers a secret.

- Go back in time to gather clues and explore the town to find hints to solve the case.

- Interview suspects and pursue the truth in TV episode-like chapters.

- Experience a unique retro art style as you visit the past.
70010000104061.name: Path of Mystery: A Brush with Death

70010000106309.description:
The gods of Olympus seek a mortal champion to fight against a rising darkness. Only those who endure their trials may be chosen.
In Trials of Olympus, you journey through the realms of Ares, Artemis, Hades, Poseidon, and Zeus. Each god’s domain holds three great trials — vast platforming levels filled with traps, enemies, and divine essences to recover.
You cannot fight, for no weapon is yet yours. Instead, rely on agility and wit:
•	Dash forward, upward, or downward to escape danger.
•	Double jump and float across perilous gaps.
•	Dodge fearsome enemies you cannot yet strike.
•	Collect ambrosia to restore your mana and keep moving.
•	Explore expansive worlds inspired by each god’s power.
Gather all divine essences and earn the gods’ favour to ascend Olympus. Male or female hero — switch freely and face your destiny.
Will you be the mortal chosen to stand with the gods?
70010000106309.intro: Endure the Trials of the Gods in a fluid platforming adventure.
70010000106309.name: Trials of Olympus

70010000107128.description:
This update to the original 2017 collection adds two new games – Bonkers and Goof Troop – to the lineup for a total of eight games, including DuckTales, DuckTales 2, Chip 'n Dale Rescue Rangers, Chip 'n Dale Rescue Rangers 2, TaleSpin and Darkwing Duck. This is the first time that Goof Troop and Bonkers have been re-released anywhere.

The collection includes quality-of-life updates to the original games and a number of additional features. A REWIND feature lets you correct missed jumps and other mistakes. SAVE lets you mark your progress. You can test your speedrun skills with BOSS RUSH and TIME ATTACK modes (Goof Troop and Bonkers excluded), each with online leaderboards. And you can rock out to the tunes you remember in the MUSIC PLAYER. Then, enter GALLERY MODE to get a glimpse behind the scenes with a fascinating virtual museum curated by Digital Eclipse's historians.

GAME DESCRIPTIONS

BONKERS: This wacky platformer is packed with Easter eggs for Disney fans. Navigate six levels of Toontown in search of items that have gone missing – the Sorcerer's Hat, the Mermaid's Voice, and the Magic Lamp. 

GOOF TROOP: A family, co-op adventure starring father-son duo, Goofy and Max. Solve puzzles as they try to rescue their friends from a pirate island.

DUCKTALES and DUCKTALES 2: Play as Scrooge McDuck with a cane that doubles as a weapon and a pogo stick. The multi-path levels are packed with secrets and surprises, along with a great soundtrack.

CHIP ‘N DALE RESCUE RANGERS and CHIP ‘N DALE RESCUE RANGERS 2: A duo of early 8-bit, co-op platformers featuring loveable chipmunk detectives. Work together to walk and jump through levels, picking up acorns, boxes, and other objects to throw at your enemies. 

TALESPIN: A challenging, side-scrolling shooter, where you fly through the skies as Baloo in his plane, The Sea Duck. Use your quick reflexes and ace piloting skills to make it through the variety of enemies and bosses. 

DARKWING DUCK: Fight crime as the winged terror himself, Darkwing Duck, and battle a variety of enemies with your gas gun.

FEATURE LIST

- Play 8 classic games, including Bonkers, Goof Troop, DuckTales, DuckTales 2, Chip 'n Dale Rescue Rangers, Chip 'n Dale Rescue Rangers 2, TaleSpin, and Darkwing Duck.

- New Rewind and Save features make gameplay easier and more accessible for new players.

- Play Time Attack and Boss Rush modes (Goof Troop and Bonkers excluded) and post your best speedrun times to the online leaderboards.

- Gallery Mode includes behind-the-scenes materials and archival content from the Disney vaults.

- Listen to original soundtracks from all 8 games.
70010000107128.intro: Travel back to the ‘90s in this collection of retro Disney games.
70010000107128.name: The Disney Afternoon Collection

70010000109382.description:
Build an unbeatable haunted house of nightmares. In HauntedManager, you'll manage guests, money, and mischievous ghosts while enjoying simple top-down tower defense gameplay.

・You've become the manager of a haunted house!
・Spook guests and chase them out before they make it to the finish line.
・Manage your team of mischievous ghosts.
・Usher crying guests toward the exit so they don't spoil the experience for others.
・Elite guests from the Main Shrine will come to taunt you. Beat them at their own game and have them join your team.

Ghost Staff Members -
・Doppelganger: Not even she knows who she's a copy of, making her basically just another human.
・Crasher: An entity that once dominated the world, though now so well-known that no one fears her.
・Hasshaku: An urban legend of internet origins who doles out physical attacks. Also good at basketball.
...And more!
70010000109382.name: HauntedManager

70010000110353.description:
Grow a variety of plants, trade them for unique furniture, and customize your garden in this calming mix of farming, puzzle-solving, and strategy. With no scores or time limits, it’s all about relaxing, experimenting, and letting your creativity bloom!

EVERYTHING IS A TOY IN TINY GARDEN!

Tiny Garden is a soothing, stress-free mix of farming, puzzles, and discovery - all inside a charming toy. Grow a variety of plants, from colourful vegetables to whimsical flowers, each with its own unique mechanics waiting to be uncovered. As your garden flourishes, trade your harvests for fun, toy furniture, and design your very own magical space.

A TOY WITH HISTORY

Before you got your hands on Tiny Garden, others have played with this toy. Through letters, you'll uncover a heartfelt story that reminds us that objects aren’t just things - they hold the traces of lives lived and stories shared. Each new discovery offers more than just a piece of furniture or a plant - it’s a glimpse into a deeper connection.

RELAX, DISCOVER, CREATE

Tiny Garden invites you to turn the crank, make things happen, and enjoy a wholesome but thoughtful experience. Each turn should be carefully considered - each decision and each new plant can reveal hidden surprises or unlock the next step in your garden’s evolution. There are no wrong choices here - just a relaxing journey where you can unwind, explore, and create without pressure.
70010000110353.intro: Tiny Garden lets you grow a pocket-sized garden inside a magical toy passed down through generations.
70010000110353.name: Tiny Garden

70010000112232.description:
■Unique Controls
Explore the unique and challenging "Rotation Control Mode" where your character spins as you rotate the stick.

The game starts with a standard control method, making it easy for anyone to enjoy. When you're ready, dive into the challenge of mastering the unique "Rotation Control Mode," where your character spins as you rotate the stick.

■Unique World
There is no time to worry about why macho is in space or why he does side rolls.

All you need to understand is that he is in space and must return to Earth.

■Simple Rules
The only way is up! All you need is the physical strength to keep rolling and the determination to never give up.

■Various Areas
As you progress, the environment changes, demanding different strategies. To survive in space, you must adapt to the situation.

■Great Music
The music changes with each area and will make you feel excited. Enjoy the carefully curated soundtrack.
70010000112232.intro: Rolling Macho: Tumbling to Earth is a rolling action game where you roll and squat your way back to Earth after being stranded in space.
70010000112232.name: Rolling Macho: Tumbling to Earth

70010000112636.description:
Afterplace is an adventurous retro game for those who like to get lost. It's a huge open world, full of hidden secrets, treasures, and creatures. Explore the woods, fight monsters, talk to ostensibly shady characters, walk away from those characters mid-conversation (if you want to), and get so lost you fall out of the world entirely (and maybe even into another). You never know what the forest might be hiding, and not all trails are paved. Labyrinths and dungeons are tucked away in the most concealed nooks. There are no waypoints in Afterplace. You'll have to forge your own path.

Afterplace strives to bring an experience that feels both small and immense at the same time. The game has simple, fluid controls, allowing you to focus on exploration and discovery. Characters are happy to chat - or you can run right past them! You get to choose what story to explore, if any at all (we are not responsible for the consequences of ignoring the story, whatever they may be).

FEATURES

-About 10 hours of unique gameplay (and much more if you lose your way)
-No overworld map
-An open world that lets you explore any path in any order
-Tons of friends, enemies, and at least one frenemy
-The ability to upgrade weapons, purchase armor, and ingest hazardous chemicals to increase your power
-Okay maybe there is an overworld map
-Multiple endings, decided by choices you probably don't even know you're making
-Like 25 unique enemies? That's a lot, right?
-Wait, no, this overworld map is written on a napkin with crayon. That won't do. 
-Secret paths that will take you to completely normal and fun places
-A cat that you can pet. With your sword. 
-The 25 unique monsters are really special though. They have sparkling personalities, and aren't like other monsters.
-At least two overworld maps.
70010000112636.intro: Explore the woods, find hidden paths, hack and slash through strange monsters, and try very, very hard not to break reality. Or don't. You do you.
70010000112636.name: Afterplace

70010000112897.description:
At the Exit Lab, we’re running the Exit Skill Test to collect data on every visitor’s Exit Skill!
With your personal guide, the Examiner, leading the way, take on escape rooms crafted by our Lab researchers and boost that Exit Skill!

■ Five Rooms, Each with Its Own Unique Style
The five rooms prepared for you all feature totally different themes, so every escape feels fresh and exciting.
This software offers a “Beginner Course,” perfect for first-time escape players.

■ Explore & Solve Puzzles!
Each room hides tons of items and tricky gimmicks.
Exploring every nook and cranny is the first step to escaping!
Check anything that feels suspicious and crack the gimmicks blocking your path!
70010000112897.intro: Welcome to the Exit Lab, where we research your Exit Skill! Take on beginner-friendly escape challenges and level up your Exit Skill!
70010000112897.name: Exit Lab Beginner Level

70010000112903.description:
At the Exit Lab, we’re running the Exit Skill Test to collect data on every visitor’s Exit Skill!
With your personal guide, the Examiner, leading the way, take on escape rooms crafted by our Lab researchers and boost that Exit Skill!

■ Five Rooms, Each with Its Own Unique Style
The five rooms prepared for you all feature totally different themes, so every escape feels fresh and exciting.
This software offers an “Intermediate Course,” designed for players who’ve already gotten the hang of escape games.

■ Explore & Solve Puzzles!
Each room hides tons of items and tricky gimmicks.
Exploring every nook and cranny is the first step to escaping!
Check anything that feels suspicious and crack the gimmicks blocking your path!
70010000112903.intro: Welcome to the Exit Lab, where we research your Exit Skill! Take on intermediate escape challenges and level up your Exit Skill!
70010000112903.name: Exit Lab Intermediate Level

70010000112908.description:
At the Exit Lab, we’re running the Exit Skill Test to collect data on every visitor’s Exit Skill!
With your personal guide, the Examiner, leading the way, take on escape rooms crafted by our Lab researchers and boost that Exit Skill!

■ Five Rooms, Each with Its Own Unique Style
The five rooms prepared for you all feature totally different themes, so every escape feels fresh and exciting.
This software offers an “Advanced Course,” filled with tough and satisfying puzzles.

■ Explore & Solve Puzzles!
Each room hides tons of items and tricky gimmicks.
Exploring every nook and cranny is the first step to escaping!
Check anything that feels suspicious and crack the gimmicks blocking your path!
70010000112908.intro:
Welcome to the Exit Lab, where we research your Exit Skill! Challenge advanced escape rooms
and aim for that Master rank!
70010000112908.name: Exit Lab Expert Level

70010000113196.description:
You’re an indebted angler, trapped in a vicious cycle of borrowing and desperation. One dark, endless night at sea you haul up something unnatural: a talking fish named Cagliuso. It promises you riches — but its bargains come with terrifying strings.
In LOAN SHARK, the nets you cast bring more than fish. They pull you toward sacrifice, secrets, and a deadline you may never meet. The “loan shark” isn’t just metaphoric — something is stalking the waters, your time is running out, and every deal you strike pushes you deeper into the unknown."
• Short, intense experience – Designed for a compact but unforgettable playthrough.
• Underwater eye-cam mechanic – Watch the lure in submerged view, anticipate the bite, then pull fast while the depths watch you.
• Fish & gut mechanic – After you reel them in, you must gut the fish yourself… carefully. Mistakes may cut you.
• Surreal dialogues & meaningful choices – Meet Cagliuso and barter with a one-eyed talking fish. Every choice alters your path.
• Time pressure & looming threat – The loan shark is coming. The clock ticks. Something hides in the darkness.
• Atmospheric horror & creeping dread – The deep sea becomes your adversary; the familiar becomes monstrous.
70010000113196.intro: A desperate fisherman makes a deadly deal with a talking fish that trades riches for pieces of his soul.
70010000113196.name: Loan Shark

70010000113203.description:
The fourth entry in the highly acclaimed M2ShotTriggers line to release worldwide, the Kyukyoku Tiger-Heli collection includes the two "Tiger" games by the developer Toaplan, responsible for many a fabled arcade shooting games.

Kyukyoku Tiger/Twin Cobra (1987) is one of Toaplan's most emblematic works. The game revolves around strategic use of the main weapons and the devastating bombs, which riveted the attention of not only hardcore arcade-goers but also office workers looking for a quick 'buzz'. The seed of its core mechanics can be seen in its predecessor Tiger-Heli (1985), which is also present in this collection.

For veteran shooters and new pilots 
In addition to the authentic "Arcade Mode" which is a faithful recreation of the original's rock-hard gameplay, both titles include a "Super Easy Mode" that allows even genre newcomers to enjoy the games.

Support functions and intel
The game is packed with a variety of features that help the player. The M2 gadgets displayed on the left and right of the playing field alert the player of enemies appearing from blind spots, the location of hidden features, what the next item will be, and other things that help you improve your chances of surviving the barrage of enemies.

Be an arcade hero
Includes the popular Arcade Challenge mode from the M2ShotTriggers! Each stage is divided into small areas to enhance your training, and a rewind function to make things even more efficient!
With practice comes perfection; a one-credit clear can be yours!
70010000113203.intro: The Tigers Return. The Legend Begins Anew––
70010000113203.name: Kyukyoku TigerHeli -TOAPLAN ARCADE GARAGE-

70010000113396.description:
A gentle, laid-back life begins in a village surrounded by nature.
Cast your line into rivers, lakes, and the open sea, and enjoy fishing whenever the mood strikes.
Spend peaceful days getting to know the village's charming residents and soaking in a calming, heartwarming atmosphere.

Before long, massive King Fish lurking in the waters will reveal themselves.
Beyond them awaits a legendary creature spoken of only in tales.
Sharpen your skills, upgrade your gear, and challenge the Legendary King!

[Easy-to-Learn Fishing Controls]
Fishing is simple and intuitive!
Tilt the stick to line it up with the gauge, then hold down the button!
Reel in your catch before it gets away!

[Over 120 Types of Creatures to Discover!]
Fill out your collection, aim for record-breaking sizes, and enjoy plenty of challenges.
Explore different locations and strive for 100% completion!

[Collect Fishing Gear]
Use the money you earn to buy new equipment.
Gather fishing rods and lures to take on even bigger fish!

[Interact with the Villagers]
Chatting with villagers may earn you helpful fishing tips.
Sometimes, you'll be invited to partake in fun minigames like catching runaway chickens or racing along the beach, all for special rewards!

[Customise Your Home]
Place purchased furniture in your house and make it your own.
Decorate with your favourite items, display your caught fish in a tank, and create a room that's uniquely yours.

[Online Rankings]
Take on the Score Attack Challenge at the local fishing hole!
See how many fish you can catch within the time limit and test your skills.
Check rankings based on your total catches and aim for the top spot.
Fish your way to No. 1!
70010000113396.intro:
Relax and unwind.
Enjoy a slow life all your own, spent fishing at your own pace.
70010000113396.name: Peaceful Fishing Story

70010000113545.description:
Get ready to fluff your brain and relax your heart, because this little sheep in a top hat is about to turn puzzle-solving into the cutest ritual of calm you’ve ever seen. Magic Sheep is a charming, slow-paced puzzle adventure where you push wooden barrels across peaceful gardens until each one rests perfectly on a marble pedestal. No pressure, no timer, only soft music, gentle thinking, and plenty of “oh, that was clever” moments.

Each level is a tiny diorama built with love. You study the layout, plan a clean path, slide through narrow passages, avoid blocking yourself, and decide the perfect order to move each barrel. If something goes wrong, no worries at all. Undo takes you back one step, Restart lets you rethink the whole puzzle, and the atmosphere stays quiet and comforting from start to finish.

Across 30 handcrafted stages set between two biomes, the bright Summer and the cosy Autumn, you’ll enjoy warm colours, relaxing scenery, and puzzles that grow more satisfying as you progress. Finishing a level fills the screen with a cheerful little jingle, rewarding your clever route and inviting you to the next peaceful challenge.

Magic Sheep is perfect for players who love cosy visuals, gentle strategy, and the joy of solving puzzles at their own pace, all in the company of the happiest sheep in a top hat.
70010000113545.intro: A Cosy Puzzle of Barrels and Marble Charms
70010000113545.name: Magic Sheep

70010000113713.description:
You’ve washed ashore on a mysterious island where ancient emojis have awakened — and they’re not happy to see you.
This rogue-like first-person shooter throws you into wild, fast-paced combat against tiki emojis wearing carved masks and wielding primal powers.
Before each run, customize your experience with crazy modifiers: make enemies bounce, wear funny hats, or unleash volcanic chaos for maximum challenge. Choose your arena — from overgrown jungles and hidden beach ruins to ancient temples filled with deadly traps — each location has its own hazards, secrets, and surprises.
Armed with just a pistol, you’ll face wave after wave of emojis that rush, leap, explode, or even summon others to fight. Defeat them to collect glowing orbs, level up, and unlock upgrades or powerful new weapons. Each decision shapes your survival — will you go for raw power, faster reloads, or explosive mayhem?
Every battle becomes a frantic dance of dodging lava bursts, leaping over collapsing bridges, and using temple traps to your advantage. The further you go, the wilder the island gets — until you’re overwhelmed by the ancient emoji horde.
Survive long enough, and you’ll uncover new arenas, more upgrades, and deeper chaos for your next run.
Can you conquer the island before the emojis claim you?
70010000113713.intro: Fast-paced rogue-like FPS mayhem on a mysterious island!
70010000113713.name: Emoji Battlefield - Island Warfare

70010000114286.description:
Golfing Over It with Alva Majo is a discouraging game about climbing a surreal mountain with a golf ball.
Experience the challenge of climbing an unyielding mountain without infuriating controls being part of that challenge.

Bennett Foddy has played this game and granted it his blessing.

Features:

- Golf your way up to the top.
- Listen as Alva explains why he made such a cruel game.
- Fall all the way back to the bottom.
- And if you manage to get to the top?
- Will that make you feel good?
- Will you feel that it's all been worth it?
- I think you will.
70010000114286.intro: The higher you climb, the bigger the fall.
70010000114286.name: Golfing Over It with Alva Majo

70010000114611.description:
NemoSphere is the easy-play shooter

Left and right operation and shoot

Shoot to the sphere coming from the left and right

The ejected block is speedy

The key point is timing

Leave your best time
70010000114611.name: NemoSphere

70010000115193.description:
Sociable Soccer Champions is an all-action carnival of fast-paced arcade football action. In addition to offering the most exciting version of the world's most popular sport, Sociable Soccer Champions allows you to assemble your dream team from an extensive roster of more than 14,000 licensed professional footballers, each with their unique skills and attributes faithfully replicated.

Experience the authenticity of the beautiful game in a variety of unique and different ways...

In World Mode you lead your favourite club through the greatest league and cup competitions from across the globe, or take your country to global glory through some of the most iconic international tournaments.

Or if you want a more immediate thrill, why not dive into a Friendly match, pitting any one of the 1,400 featured teams against any other, either against an AI opponent or head-to-head versus a friend in local multiplayer?

Sociable Soccer Champions features:

• Fast, intuitive arcade gameplay - easy to pick up, but hard to master
•  Aftertouch, powered shots, sprint and energy systems
•  Two Player Couch Clashes to relive the good old days, playing against a friend in the ultimate face-to-face match up!
•  Multiple ways to play: Coach (just watch), Casual and Pro
•  More than 14,000 FIFPRO licensed professional players to collect and upgrade
•  Up-to-date player, team and competition data for 1,400 teams from across the football world
•  More than 80 trophies to win
•  A host of unique referees, each with a different personality and style, to keep you on your toes

Join the passionate community of football fans, compete for glory and celebrate the true spirit of the beautiful game in the latest release in this this remarkable gaming franchise.
70010000115193.name: Sociable Soccer Champions

70010000115905.description:
Build a waterpark that’s louder, splashier, and slightly more chaotic than anyone planned. Start with a patch of land and a few modest slides, then turn it into a full-blown splash factory packed with looping rides, giant pools, and attractions that make guests question their life choices—in a good way.

At first, it’s all on you. You’ll sell tickets, serve snacks, fix broken pumps, and scoop lost flip-flops out of the wave pool. As the crowds grow, so does the madness. Slides clog, kids cannonball where they shouldn’t, and someone always forgets sunscreen. Welcome to management.

Design every corner your way. Paint slides in wild colours, rearrange pool layouts, add decorations, and build the kind of place people brag about surviving. The physics keep things lively—expect dramatic belly flops, slippery wipeouts, and the occasional “I meant to do that” moment.

Expand your park, hire staff to handle the chaos, and keep visitors happy with food, drinks, and just enough safety to keep things interesting. Because here, the goal isn’t just to build a waterpark—it’s to build the one everyone talks about on the ride home… preferably for the right reasons.
70010000115905.name: Waterpark Simulator 2025

70010000116306.description:
This title is an action role-playing game originally included in Disc Station SP No. 2, released by Compile in 1989.

The game features a rather unique premise: the protagonist, Kelesis, sets out on a journey of culinary training (an adventure) to gain approval to marry a young lady. It covers all the classic elements expected of an action RPG from this era, including switching between top-down and side-scrolling views depending on the scene, as well as battling massive boss characters.

Notably, this game is a parody of Shin Maou Golvellius (True Demon King Golvellius), so fans of that series should feel right at home. While the quirky presentation—typical of Compile—gives this title a lighter tone than the original, it remains a thoroughly enjoyable and solid action RPG.
 

 *The main game and gallery screen (*Gallery) are in Japanese version.
 *Other menu screens and ""How to play"" screens are in English.
70010000116306.intro: Inheriting the gameplay of 'Shin Maou Golvellius' but set in a unique world. Now, time to embark on your culinary quest!?
70010000116306.name: EGGCONSOLE SUPER COOKS MSX2

70010000116516.description:
Move through 3D space to find hints, solve mysteries and escape from the room.
Anyone can play to the end because you can see hints and answers.
70010000116516.name: Escape game R00M10

70010000116904.description:
Monkey in the Zoo puts you inside the mind — and mischief — of a monkey behind bars. The real attraction isn’t you… it’s the unpredictable humans who wander up to your cage.

Some visitors arrive with smiles and snacks.
Others come armed with loud voices, pushy attitudes, or questionable intentions.
How you react — playful, curious, or gloriously chaotic — shapes every moment.

Grab whatever you can reach.
Eat it, throw it, break it, or offer it back with suspicious kindness.
Your cage is a fully interactive playground, and every visitor becomes part of your improvised story.

From harmless comedy to tense standoffs, no encounter is ever the same.

You may be behind bars — but you decide who’s really in control.
70010000116904.intro: Step inside the cage. Banana drama guaranteed.
70010000116904.name: Monkey in the Zoo

70010000116991.description:
One could say POOLS is like an art gallery where you look around and listen to the sounds. There are very few things to solve apart from a few mazes. Sometimes the game can challenge your navigation skills. But mostly you're just... there.

POOLS has no user interface and no dialogue. No background music. Instead, it uses sounds to make you feel like you're really there. The sounds and echo change depending on the room you're in. Walking in water is slower. All of these things make the game feel more real and create a tense atmosphere.

There's no typical story, no characters to meet, and you won't find any notes in-game. But as you explore and advance further, you start to notice that the game's world changes around you. Rooms look and feel different. Each chapter contains something unique. You're constantly exploring new places, each with its own kind of mystery.


Note: There are no monsters chasing you or jumping suddenly towards you, but the atmosphere can feel oppressive. POOLS plays on the fears of getting lost, the dark, and tight spaces.

Note: POOLS consists of six unique chapters, each taking between 10 and 30 minutes to play through.


POOLS is inspired by the internet phenomena "liminal spaces", "found footage" and "The Backrooms" - specifically "Backrooms Pools" or "Poolrooms".
70010000116991.intro: Walking simulator. Explore, admire and listen.
70010000116991.name: POOLS

70010000117058.description:
Dive into a world of stunning, realistic puzzles that captivate your eyes and mind. Piece by piece, reveal breathtaking images of beautiful women — each completed puzzle unlocks a new masterpiece, keeping you motivated to discover what’s next.

Smooth and intuitive touch controls make gameplay effortless and deeply satisfying — you’ll feel like you’re truly shaping every picture with your own hands. Gentle, soothing music sets the perfect mood, helping you unwind while your curiosity pulls you to complete the next challenge.

Relax, enjoy, and let yourself get lost in the details.

Features:
• Addictive, easy-to-play puzzle mechanics.
• Gorgeous, realistic artwork of women.
• Satisfying touch interaction — every move feels natural.
• Unlock new, even more stunning images as you progress.
• Perfect balance of challenge and relaxation.
• Soothing soundtrack that enhances your focus and mood.
• Admire each completed image in full detail.
70010000117058.intro: Every piece brings you closer to perfection!
70010000117058.name: Hentai House: Lost Rooms

70010000118336.description: Relax and engage your mind with these relaxing logic puzzles. Solve the number clues to reveal hidden pixel art pictures. Solving each row and column brings you closer to the final image. Enjoy the perfect blend of calm and challenge. A lot unique puzzles await you. They're perfect for a quick break or a long session. Train your brain and find your inner peace.
70010000118336.intro: Take a breather and challenge your brain with these calming logic puzzles
70010000118336.name: Picronix 2

70050000056216.description:
This DLC unlocks a brand new world for hexceed: Violaceum! 
Puzzle your way through 120 brand-new levels!
70050000056216.intro: Unlocks a new world for hexceed: Violaceum brings 120 new puzzles and includes all mechanics from the previous DLC.
70050000056216.name: Violaceum

70050000066558.description:
This DLC includes various console ports of Tiger-Heli and Kyukyoku Tiger.
On top of that, it also includes the rare beat-'em-up Get Star and its Western version Guardian, both released outside the arcades for the very first time!
*You must have a copy of the digital download version of Kyukyoku Tiger-Heli in order to play the content of this DLC.

Seven console ports
Various console versions of Tiger-Heli and Kyukyoku Tiger were made in and outside Japan, and seven of them are included in this collection. Each of them tackles the difficult mission of recreating the arcade experience in unique and inventive ways. This is the ultimate way to study the different aspects of the Tigers in their diverse habitats!

Get Star: an arcade rarity
Originally released in 1986, Get Star is an arcade side-scrolling beat-'em-up, where you play the role of the titular robot, combating enemies with punches, kicks, and occasional special weapons. Free six planets from the oppressive rule of Big Demorr!
Also includes the international version, Guardian!

The following games will be added to the base game with this DLC:
• Kyukyoku Tiger FC Ver. (1989)
• Kyukyoku Tiger PC Engine Ver. (1989)
• Kyukyoku Tiger Mega Drive Ver. (1991)
• Twin Cobra NES Ver. (1989)
• Twin Cobra Genesis Ver. (1991)
• Tiger-Heli FC Ver. (1986)
• Tiger Heli NES Ver. (1987)
• Get Star (1986)
• Guardian (1986)
70050000066558.name: Kyukyoku TigerHeli - Console Ports + Get Star Pack

70010000080990.description:
App includes:
- A digital artbook featuring background art and illustrations from the making of Tales of Berseria Remastered.
- A digital soundtrack where players can listen to in-game BGM tracks.

*The Digital Art Book & Soundtrack is a separate application from the main game.
70010000080990.name: Tales of Berseria Remastered - Digital Artbook & Soundtrack

70010000081381.description:
Tales of Berseria returns with enhanced graphics and optimized gameplay!

Engage in the ultimate quest for self-discovery, remastered for the first time. The sacred kingdom awaits the arrival of its savior, and a lone woman named Velvet is marked by traumatic deceit.. Join Velvet on her journey for vengeance, along with her cast of eccentric companions, as they sail through the archipelago which comprises the kingdom of Midgand.

• A Tale of Emotion Versus Reason
Let emotions guide your destiny, or maintain order with the power of reason. Witness the eternal struggle between the head and the heart as Velvet is challenged to stand by her convictions while the world around her compresses into a system of order.

• An Exhilarating Combat System
Freely choose Artes to suit your playstyle and perform a variety of combos. Collect enemy Souls to unleash a barrage of attacks for a thrilling battle experience.

• A Modern, High-Quality Retelling
Useful features like destination markers and the ability to disable enemy encounters make traversing the islands of Midgand all the more enticing. Visit the famous Grade Shop from the game's opening. Get a smooth play experience only found in this remaster!

• Access DLC from the First Iteration
This version features several DLC from the original 2016 version. A treasure trove of content awaits you, such as outfits for your characters from the previous Tales Of games along with useful equipment for your travels.

*A Deluxe Edition is also available. Be careful of duplicate purchases.
70010000081381.name: Tales of Berseria Remastered

70010000089687.description:
Return to 2048 Hong Kong in the groundbreaking prequel that defined style and mature storytelling for a generation.



Set two years before the events of Fear Effect, dive into a sprawling adventure that takes you from futuristic cityscapes to the lost tomb of China's first emperor, and discover the origins of mercenaries Hana Tsu-Vachel, Royce Glas, Deke Decourt, and the enigmatic Rain Qin, in a story that blends high-tech espionage with ancient Chinese mythology and the supernatural.



Unforgettable Cinema

Be captivated by the iconic visual style, blending cel-shaded 3D characters with fully streaming, animated FMV backgrounds. It’s an unforgettable, graphic novel-like aesthetic that remains unique.



Survival Meets Action

Test your nerves with the innovative "Fear Effect" system, where your combat effectiveness is tied to your heart rate. Experience a world packed with intense action, strategic stealth kills, and classic survival horror puzzles.



Play the classic game, enhanced for your Nintendo Switch™.

Enjoy a timeless classic with enhanced quality-of-life features, including Save States, Rewind, Widescreen mode, Achievements, and CRT filters, to ensure an authentic experience.
70010000089687.name: Fear Effect 2: Retro Helix

70010000099911.description:
Laysara: Summit Kingdom is a challenging city builder which tasks you with creating a new home for your people forced out of the lowlands. During a campaign or sandbox playthrough, you will establish multiple towns, each on a unique mountain with its own traits. All your towns co-exist in symbiosis, creating a trading network, which you can then adjust to your needs by revisiting already developed settlements. The Kingdom of Laysara has to be rebuilt!

BUILD ON A MOUNTAIN
Each mountain comes with a new set of challenges. Mounts differ in shapes, vegetation zone layouts, resource availability and weather conditions. Sometimes you will have plenty of room for farming in green lowlands, sometimes you will need to rely on breeding and extracting valuable minerals from regions dangerously close to peak glaciers. If you find yourself in dire need of a certain resource, you can always try to establish a trading route with another town.

DEAL WITH AVALANCHES
One of the ever-present dangers you will have to deal with are mighty avalanches. You can’t stop them, but you can take precautions and be prepared. Afforest the key areas to create natural barriers, build artificial ones to redirect rushing masses of snow, or trigger the avalanche early, while it’s still manageable. Create a deliberate and reliable strategy and you might even be able to use the power of snow to your advantage; fail to do so and find your city buried and devastated!

CRAFT A TRANSPORT NETWORK
So, transporting goods is easy, right? Well, not if your destination lies on the other side of the mountain, a few hundred meters higher, behind cliffs, ridges, canyons and rivers. You will need to create a vast, complex transport network consisting of roads, bridges and shafts to ensure reliable delivery chains. As demand for resources will grow alongside the town’s population, always look for opportunities to optimise your transportation network, be it by building paved roads, using more advanced lifting constructions, or aiding your carriers with glamorous yaks.

RAISE A SUMMIT TEMPLE
If you manage to endure all mountain dangers, build a network of efficient production chains and satisfy all needs of your people, there is only one more thing to be done: conquering the mountain peak! To succeed in this great endeavour you’ll need to reach the summit and establish safe routes for your carriers to bring in enormous amounts of building resources, but beware! Weather at this height is as deadly as ever. The final effect is well worth the effort though, as raising the summit temple is an act of total triumph of human courage (and your logistics skills!) over the elements.

Final note: the game is a pure city building experience solely focused on the economy, resource management and surviving despite the inhospitable environment. Therefore, the game doesn’t feature combat or any other military aspects.
70010000099911.intro: Build and expand your very own settlements in high mountains!
70010000099911.name: Laysara: Summit Kingdom

70010000105557.description: Step into the gritty streets of Chicago in Whiskey Mafia: Blacklist, a story-driven crime adventure. Play as a determined detective navigating a city full of gangsters, corrupt cops, and hidden dangers. Investigate crimes, follow leads, interrogate witnesses, and uncover the secrets of a mysterious Russian crime syndicate. Explore diverse locations from bustling markets and shady bars to the dangerous docks. Experience immersive dialogues, thrilling chases, and tense confrontations in a detailed, atmospheric city. Can you survive the criminal underworld and bring justice to the streets of Chicago?
70010000105557.intro: A new chapter in Whiskey Mafia story.
70010000105557.name: Whiskey Mafia: Blacklist

70010000105698.description:
Cast your line. Watch the water. Wait for the perfect moment.

Enter the world of Fishing Pro Simulator, a relaxing fishing simulator with light RPG elements, where patience, skill, and exploration shape every catch. Travel across peaceful lakes, flowing rivers, and vast open waters, each hiding its own fish species, secrets, and challenges. Every location invites you to slow down, observe nature, and master the art of fishing one cast at a time.

What begins as a simple fishing trip grows into a journey of progression and discovery. Choose your gear carefully, adapt to changing weather and time of day, and learn how different fish behave beneath the surface. Rare and legendary species demand experience, upgraded equipment, and the right conditions. Each successful catch brings rewards, unlocks new areas, and builds your personal trophy collection.

Fishing Pro Simulator is not about rushing—it’s about timing, balance, and growth. Whether you’re completing daily challenges, expanding your fishing album, or hunting for the next rare catch, every session offers a calm yet rewarding experience where skill meets serenity.

Key Features:

- Relaxing fishing simulation with light RPG progression

- Multiple fishing locations with unique fish species

- Dynamic conditions influenced by weather and time of day

- Gear upgrades that unlock new challenges and rare catches

-Daily and weekly goals that encourage exploration and mastery

The water is calm, but the challenge lies beneath.
Cast your line, trust your instincts, and build your legacy in Fishing Pro Simulator.
70010000105698.intro: From quiet waters to rare trophies.
70010000105698.name: Fishing Pro Simulator

70010000105922.description:
Take the Challenge
Deivy made a pact with Randoom, he would be his toy and go through all of Randoom's challenges in exchange for having anything he wanted after it was over. Now Deivy has been turned into a chess piece and is trapped in Randoom's mansion, a dangerous place full of challenges.

What is Trials of Randoom?
Trials of Randoom is a precision platformer with puzzle elements, featuring Deivy and his terrifying situation in search of freedom and salvation.


Who is Deivy?
Deivy was once an ordinary human. Too common. He became a pawn to participate in Random's challenges, as he was so desperate that he would do absolutely anything to achieve his goal, even making a pact with a demon.


The Mighty Random
Random is what some call the crossroads demon, but this crossroads story is just a popular myth, as he can show himself anywhere. It appears when someone is in a completely hopeless situation. When a person is so hopeless and ready to accept anything, that's when he offers his deals. He makes fun of people in exchange for helping them with their problems.



The Mansion
The mansion, in which Deivy is imprisoned, is special. Deivy's movements are limited by the powers of the mansion, making every challenge even more difficult!

The challenges in the mansion are very diverse. Will Deivy make it through them all?!
70010000105922.intro: Trials Of Randoom is a unique puzzle game with immense challenges and great mysteries. Each level is unique and your experience will be unforgettable as you solve the puzzles
70010000105922.name: Trials Of Randoom

70010000106420.description:
Too long in this prison, time to get out of here. Pull the carpet and start digging with a teaspoon. Watch out for the guard, sell him the junk you find. Trade toilet paper with the prisoners. Get better items and improve your stats. Expand the tunnel, use glow sticks and dynamite. Will you escape?

Check if you could escape from prison.
The day has come when the book is no longer enjoyable, the jokes of the cellmates next door are no longer funny, and it's time to break out of this boring prison. Get some tools and start digging.

Ways to survive in prison.
Maybe you can trade with the guard for some goodies, maybe the guys will give you something better to dig in exchange for toilet paper.

Watch out for the guard's inspections, cover the carpet, remove the sand you dig up in the toilet, don't get caught. Get food, better shoes, and bigger shovels. Exercise to have more strength and energy, buy better backpacks to dig more valuable items from the ground.

Pimp the pad.
Maybe you can buy something from Mrs. Dorothy in the prison warehouse? Buy furniture, glow sticks, more beautiful carpets, and better toilets to remove the sand faster.


Get respect or get buried.
In Prison Escape Simulator, gambling isn’t just a pastime, it’s a way to gain influence. Money and reputation are all on the line. Every bet carries risk: you might get rich or end up in debt. Play smart, because in this prison, bluffing can be just as powerful as digging.

So, will you survive behind bars and prepare for the grand escape?
Read the letters with hints on how deep and in which direction to dig, and maybe one day you'll get out of prison?

In Prison Escape Simulator you can mine, trade, upgrade your cell and have tons of fun when no one is watching. A few hours of excitement for the price of a burger. Will you escape?
70010000106420.name: Prison Escape Simulator

70010000111154.description:
I was just hoping for a quiet school life...
But then I got targeted by a cheerful and mysterious beauty!
She leads the eccentric club known as the “Happy Life Research Society” and is a legendary figure at school—Rina Shinonome.
Beautiful, smart, athletic... yet her personality is so outrageous, it’s overwhelming!?
After being called “the chosen one,” I was dragged into the club against my will.
Day after day, I found myself caught up in her whirlwind pace.
But behind her constant smile... she seems to be hiding a secret no one knows—?
Includes Japanese voice acting.
70010000111154.intro: Perfect girl × Mad rule = No turning back from school life!?
70010000111154.name: Rina-sama☆Musou ~The Chosen One and the Reign of Madness~

70010000113552.description:
Welcome to Meowgic Mix, an adorable pixel art puzzle where a floating cat on a living book must mix potions and deliver them to the correct cauldrons. There are 30 stages inside a magical academy, with challenges that require strategy, logic, and a good dose of feline cleverness.

Observe the classroom where each cauldron awaits its perfect potion. Push bottles, plan your route, and avoid getting stuck while solving each enchanted mini-puzzle. And if something goes wrong, no worries — undo or restart is always just a paw away.

Meowgic Mix combines charming pixel visuals, relaxing music, and mechanics made for players who love calm puzzles, cute animals, and a touch of fantasy. Get ready for a cosy, clever, purr-magical experience where every completed level is a tiny victory in feline alchemy.
70010000113552.name: Meowgic Mix

70010000117220.description:
Escape into Jigsaw Realms: Oasis, a relaxing jigsaw puzzle adventure set in beautiful oasis landscapes.

Piece together stunning scenes across 30 handcrafted levels, each one increasing in difficulty as your skills improve. Start with simple puzzles and work your way up to more complex challenges that will truly test your focus and patience.

Designed for both casual players and puzzle lovers, Jigsaw Realms: Oasis offers a calm, satisfying experience where every completed puzzle feels rewarding.

Features:
>30 unique jigsaw puzzle levels
>Gradually increasing difficulty
>Beautiful oasis-themed artwork
>Relaxing and focused gameplay
>Perfect for casual and dedicated puzzle fans
>Progress Saving

Take your time. Find your focus.
70010000117220.name: Jigsaw Realms: Oasis

70010000117559.description:
In a realm between life and death, a confused soul seeks redemption and freedom from a past life filled with misguided choices.

Playing alone or together via co-op multiplayer, command a soul in search of the exit from this dark and desolate realm.

Use the environment to your advantage and avoid treacherous traps to clear 30 challenging levels of hauntingly morose pixel art.


Features
* Puzzle platforming gameplay
* Single player or co-op multiplayer
* Gloomy 2D pixel art
* 30 challenging levels and 6 clever mechanics
70010000117559.intro: A puzzle platfoming journey through the shadow between life and death
70010000117559.name: Soulshard

70010000118088.description:
Inspired by the psychedelic sci-fi of the '70s & '80s, Aquamarine combines the mystery of old-school adventure games and challenging roguelikes with elements of survival, exploration, and puzzle solving.

Journey across a water world reclaimed by nature. Overcome survival and navigational challenges as you discover the planet's lost history. Master your pod's controls, study the ocean wildlife, and solve environmental puzzles to help you find your way home.

Cultivate a variety of alien plants with unique attributes. Forage the depths for food and salvage tools to help you survive. Collect and craft powerful upgrades for your humble escape pod, and customize your loadout to fit the needs of every plunge into the water.

You play as a lone space traveler known only as The Seeker. While orbiting an uncharted aquaplanet, your starcraft is disrupted by a strange signal and you're forced to eject. You crash land on a tiny island surrounded by an endless alien ocean, with nothing to help you but an amphibious survival pod. Throughout your underwater journey to reach your crashed ship, you'll uncover the planet's lost history and discover the true nature of why The Seeker ended up here.

Features:
•Study & explore three living ecosystems
•Grow your own food
•Craft new tools & tech
•Uncover the truth of why you ended up here
70010000118088.intro: A turn-based playable comic book about surviving in an alien ocean
70010000118088.name: Aquamarine: Explorer's Edition

70010000118614.description:
This is the English language version.

The thrill of the Kanto region, as well as familiar Pokémon, are just as you remember them – with updated graphics compared to the original Game Boy title. The Sevii Islands – not present in Pokémon Red Version – have also been added, greatly expanding the areas you can explore and the scope of your adventure.

Some excitement doesn’t fade no matter how many years pass. Whether it’s choosing your first partner Pokémon, confronting a sinister organisation or encountering a legend, a world of dreams and adventures with Pokémon awaits. Let’s go!
70010000118614.intro: Immerse yourself in the adventure once again in Pokémon FireRed Version!
70010000118614.name: (English) Pokémon FireRed Version

70010000118619.description:
This is the English language version.

The thrill of the Kanto region, as well as familiar Pokémon, are just as you remember them – with updated graphics compared to the original Game Boy title. The Sevii Islands – not present in Pokémon Green Version – have also been added, greatly expanding the areas you can explore and the scope of your adventure.

Some excitement doesn’t fade no matter how many years pass. Whether it’s choosing your first partner Pokémon, confronting a sinister organisation or encountering a legend, a world of dreams and adventures with Pokémon awaits. Let’s go!
70010000118619.intro: Immerse yourself in the adventure once again in Pokémon LeafGreen Version!
70010000118619.name: (English) Pokémon LeafGreen Version

70010000118624.description:
Esta es la versión del juego en español.

La magia de la región de Kanto y muchos rostros Pokémon familiares siguen estando presentes tal y como los recuerdas, pero ahora el juego incorpora gráficos modernizados en comparación con el título original de Game Boy. Por otro lado, también incluye un nuevo añadido con respecto a Pokémon Edición Roja: Archi7, un archipiélago de islas que amplía considerablemente el territorio que puedes explorar y hace que tu aventura sea aún más grande.

Algunos recuerdos no desaparecen con el paso del tiempo... Tanto si vas a elegir a tu primer compañero Pokémon, enfrentarte a una siniestra organización o tener un encuentro legendario, te espera un mundo de sueños y aventuras con los Pokémon. ¡Adelante!
70010000118624.intro: ¡Vuelve a lanzarte de lleno a la aventura en Pokémon Edición Rojo Fuego!
70010000118624.name: (Español) Pokémon Edición Rojo Fuego

70010000118626.description:
Esta es la versión del juego en español.

La magia de la región de Kanto y muchos rostros Pokémon familiares siguen estando presentes tal y como los recuerdas, pero ahora el juego incorpora gráficos modernizados en comparación con el título original de Game Boy. Por otro lado, también incluye un nuevo añadido con respecto a Pokémon Edición Verde: Archi7, un archipiélago de islas que amplía considerablemente el territorio que puedes explorar y hace que tu aventura sea aún más grande.

Algunos recuerdos no desaparecen con el paso del tiempo... Tanto si vas a elegir a tu primer compañero Pokémon, enfrentarte a una siniestra organización o tener un encuentro legendario, te espera un mundo de sueños y aventuras con los Pokémon. ¡Adelante!
70010000118626.intro: ¡Vuelve a lanzarte de lleno a la aventura en Pokémon Edición Verde Hoja!
70010000118626.name: (Español) Pokémon Edición Verde Hoja

70010000118630.description:
Il s'agit ici de la version en français.

Retrouvez l'engouement de la région de Kanto et vos Pokémon favoris comme si vous ne les aviez jamais quittés, avec des graphismes améliorés par rapport au jeu Game Boy d'origine. Les Îles Sevii, qui n'existaient pas dans Pokémon Version Rouge, ont été ajoutées afin d'enrichir votre aventure et vous proposer encore plus de lieux à explorer !

Certains souvenirs restent à jamais gravés dans nos mémoires. Qu'il s'agisse de choisir votre premier partenaire Pokémon, d'affronter une sombre organisation ou encore de faire des rencontres légendaires, un monde de rêves, d'aventures et de Pokémon vous attend !
70010000118630.intro: Revivez l'aventure Pokémon Version Rouge Feu Version !
70010000118630.name: (Français) Pokémon Version Rouge Feu

70010000118632.description:
Il s'agit ici de la version en français.

Retrouvez l'engouement de la région de Kanto et vos Pokémon favoris comme si vous ne les aviez jamais quittés, avec des graphismes améliorés par rapport au jeu Game Boy d'origine. Les Îles Sevii, qui n'existaient pas dans Pokémon Version Verte, ont été ajoutées afin d'enrichir votre aventure et vous proposer encore plus de lieux à explorer !

Certains souvenirs restent à jamais gravés dans nos mémoires. Qu'il s'agisse de choisir votre premier partenaire Pokémon, d'affronter une sombre organisation ou encore de faire des rencontres légendaires, un monde de rêves, d'aventures et de Pokémon vous attend !
70010000118632.intro: Revivez l'aventure Pokémon Version Vert Feuille !
70010000118632.name: (Français) Pokémon Version Vert Feuille

70010000118633.description:
Dies ist die Version in deutscher Sprache.

Die Kanto-Region und bekannte Pokémon genau so, wie du sie in Erinnerung hast – mit aktualisierter Grafik im Vergleich zum ursprünglichen Game Boy-Titel. Außerdem wurden die Sevii Eilanden hinzugefügt, die in Pokémon Red Version nicht vorkamen. Die Gebiete, die du erkunden kannst, und somit auch dein Abenteuer werden dadurch erweitert.

Manche Erlebnisse bleiben einfach immer spannend, egal wie viele Jahre vergehen. Sei es die Wahl deines ersten Partner-Pokémon, die Auseinandersetzung mit einer finsteren Organisation oder die Begegnung mit einer Legende – eine Welt der Träume und Abenteuer mit Pokémon erwartet dich. Los geht‘s!
70010000118633.intro: Begib dich erneut auf das Abenteuer in Pokémon Feuerrote Edition!
70010000118633.name: (Deutsch) Pokémon Feuerrote Edition

70010000118634.description:
Dies ist die Version in deutscher Sprache.

Die Kanto-Region und bekannte Pokémon genau so, wie du sie in Erinnerung hast – mit aktualisierter Grafik im Vergleich zum ursprünglichen Game Boy-Titel. Außerdem wurden die Sevii Eilanden hinzugefügt, die in Pokémon Grüne Edition nicht vorkamen. Die Gebiete, die du erkunden kannst, und somit auch deine Abenteuer werden dadurch erweitert.

Manche Erlebnisse bleiben einfach immer spannend, egal wie viele Jahre vergehen. Sei es die Wahl deines ersten Partner-Pokémon, die Auseinandersetzung mit einer finsteren Organisation oder die Begegnung mit einer Legende – eine Welt der Träume und Abenteuer mit Pokémon erwartet dich. Los geht‘s!
70010000118634.intro: Begib dich erneut auf das Abenteuer in Pokémon Blattgrüne Edition!
70010000118634.name: (Deutsch) Pokémon Blattgrüne Edition

70010000118635.description:
Questa è la versione del gioco in italiano.

Ritrova le emozioni e i Pokémon della regione di Kanto proprio come li ricordavi, ma con grafica aggiornata rispetto al titolo originale per Game Boy. Con l’aggiunta del Settipelago, non presente in Pokémon Versione Rossa, le aree da esplorare e la profondità della tua avventura sono ora molto aumentate.

Non importa quanto tempo sia passato: certe emozioni non svaniscono. Che tu debba scegliere il tuo primo Pokémon compagno, affrontare una sinistra organizzazione o incontrare una leggenda, ti aspetta un mondo di sogni e avventure con i Pokémon! Andiamo!
70010000118635.intro: Immergiti di nuovo nelle avventure di Pokémon Versione Rosso Fuoco!
70010000118635.name: (Italiano) Pokémon Versione Rosso Fuoco

70010000118636.description:
Questa è la versione del gioco in italiano.

Ritrova le emozioni e i Pokémon della regione di Kanto proprio come li ricordavi, ma con grafica aggiornata rispetto al titolo originale per Game Boy. Con l’aggiunta del Settipelago, non presente in Pokémon Versione Verde, le aree da esplorare e la profondità della tua avventura sono ora molto aumentate.

Non importa quanto tempo sia passato: certe emozioni non svaniscono. Che tu debba scegliere il tuo primo Pokémon compagno, affrontare una sinistra organizzazione o incontrare una leggenda, ti aspetta un mondo di sogni e avventure con i Pokémon! Andiamo!
70010000118636.intro: Immergiti di nuovo nell’avventura di Pokémon Versione Verde Foglia!
70010000118636.name: (Italiano) Pokémon Versione Verde Foglia

70050000065660.description:
A set of red herbs that permanently boosts a character’s stats in Tales of Berseria Remastered.

Content includes:
• Red Sage x 15
• Red Lavender x 15
• Red Verbena x 15
• Red Rosemary x 15
• Red Saffron x 15
• Red Chamomile x 15

*This set can be obtained through normal progression.
70050000065660.name: Tales of Berseria Remastered - Super Growth Support Herb Set

70050000065661.description:
Receive the Super Adventuring Assistance Set early in your Tales of Berseria Remastered journey.

Content includes:
• Apple Gel x 10
• Peach Gel x 10
• Life Bottle x 10
• Panacea Bottle x 10

*This set can be obtained through normal progression.
70050000065661.name: Tales of Berseria Remastered - Super Adventuring Assistance Set

70050000065662.description: Let the wind in your sails with a set featuring tracks from previous games in the Tales of series to play while battling in Tales of Berseria Remastered.
70050000065662.name: Tales of Berseria Remastered - Battle BGM Pack

70070000032134.description:
The Deluxe Edition includes:
• Tales of Berseria Remastered
• Battle BGM Pack
• Digital Artbook & Soundtrack
• Super Growth Support Herb Set

Tales of Berseria returns with enhanced graphics and optimized gameplay!

Engage in the ultimate quest for self-discovery, remastered for the first time. The sacred kingdom awaits the arrival of its savior, and a lone woman named Velvet is marked by traumatic deceit.. Join Velvet on her journey for vengeance, along with her cast of eccentric companions, as they sail through the archipelago which comprises the kingdom of Midgand.

• A Tale of Emotion Versus Reason
Let emotions guide your destiny, or maintain order with the power of reason. Witness the eternal struggle between the head and the heart as Velvet is challenged to stand by her convictions while the world around her compresses into a system of order.

• An Exhilarating Combat System
Freely choose Artes to suit your playstyle and perform a variety of combos. Collect enemy Souls to unleash a barrage of attacks for a thrilling battle experience.

• A Modern, High-Quality Retelling
Useful features like destination markers and the ability to disable enemy encounters make traversing the islands of Midgand all the more enticing. Visit the famous Grade Shop from the game's opening. Get a smooth play experience only found in this remaster!

• Access DLC from the First Iteration
This version features several DLC from the original 2016 version. A treasure trove of content awaits you, such as outfits for your characters from the previous Tales Of games along with useful equipment for your travels.

*A Standard Edition is also available. Be careful of duplicate purchases.
70070000032134.name: Tales of Berseria Remastered Deluxe Edition

70010000096563.description:
Building on the same core mechanics that made Mad Bullets the wackiest shooter with mind blowing, high-speed action. Now is the time to become the best in the police force! Prove your accuracy by shooting pop-up targets, pick up power-ups along your way to boost your performance. 

Do you think you have what it takes to face a real challenge?

● 9 Locations
● 60 Levels
● 3 Minigames
● 180+ Objectives
● Single player and local two-player multiplayer
70010000096563.intro: Top Cop - Police Training is a spiritual successor to Mad Bullets with new and improved tracking and centering.
70010000096563.name: Top Cop - Police Training

70010000111770.description: Relax while assembling beautiful pictures. The images of the heroines, classes, and races are inspired by a popular RPG.
70010000111770.intro: In our game, you will find very simple puzzles and pleasant music!
70010000111770.name: Anime: Fantasy Uni

70010000117374.description:
Glowfall Vale is a relaxing walking simulator set in a mystical realm filled with soft magic, glowing landscapes, and ancient forgotten paths. Explore freely through enchanted valleys, luminous forests, floating lights, and quiet ruins where magic gently flows through the land. There are no objectives, no combat, and no danger — only wonder and calm.

As you walk, the world softly glows around you. Bioluminescent plants light the paths, magical particles drift through the air, and gentle ambient sounds create a dreamlike atmosphere. Glowfall Vale is designed to feel peaceful, warm, and otherworldly — a place to slow down and simply explore.

Features:
> Relaxing Walking Simulator – Stress-free exploration with no combat or fail states
> Mystical Fantasy Realm – Enchanted valleys and glowing flora
> Magical Atmosphere – Soft lighting, floating lights, and ambient magic effects
> Soothing Soundscape – Calm music and subtle magical ambience
> Meditative Experience – Built for relaxation, reflection, and escape

Glowfall Vale invites curiosity without pressure. Follow glowing trails, pause beside shimmering waterfalls, or stand quietly as magical lights drift past.
70010000117374.name: Glowfall Vale

70010000092703.description:
Projected Dreams is a charming, cosy puzzle game emphasising a casual, stress-free gaming experience.

Delve into the room, drag toys from the shelves, and handle them on the table to create a shadow play. As the shadows you cast uncover past family relationships and the environment around you changes and evolves, the lines between reality and fantasy blur.

Experience a heartfelt story:
Join Senka on her journey and experience a heartwarming, wordless story about buzzing summer nights, the importance of friendship, and bittersweet goodbyes.

Solve puzzles in multiple ways:
Rotate, place, and stack objects on a table to recreate a given shadow silhouette on the wall through shadow play. Get creative – there are unlimited solutions to solve puzzles, as long as the outline of the shadow matches, and various achievements to be discovered.

Explore atmospheric settings:
Experience an ever-changing room and bring back memories from your own childhood thanks to the toys you will find. Discover new peculiarities while listening to relaxing soundtracks composed by Floris Demandt.
70010000092703.intro: A cozy, nostalgic puzzle game about projected dreams
70010000092703.name: Projected Dreams

70010000093467.description:
Toronto, 20XX. The city has been taken over by 3 rival gangs - the VEGANS, the ROBOTS, and the DEMONS. But who’s behind this madness? When Scott Pilgrim’s bandmates are abducted by shadowy forces, a brand-new adventure begins! 

Scott Pilgrim EX is an action-adventure game where players can fight as Scott Pilgrim, Ramona Flowers and more as they battle through the fractured time and space of Toronto. The combat gameplay is driven by instinct and improvisation - a hectic ballet of fists and flair that rewards strategy, spontaneity, and a good bit of brawling chaos. String together stylish combos, experiment with wacky weapons and unleash over-the-top special attacks. Characters can be upgraded with special badges that enhance their stats and grant special bonuses. Players will explore a whole city of interconnected levels to meet old and new faces, complete quests, and discover hidden areas. Multiplayer co-op, local or online, lets up to four players join in on the action, making it a fun, dynamic experience. 

- 7 Playable Characters
Step into the shoes of seven fan-favorite fighters, each with their own distinct combat style.

- A Brand-New Adventure 
Venture out on epic quests and battle new enemies and bosses across interconnected levels in a new story by series creator Bryan Lee O’Malley that will appeal to longtime fans and newcomers alike.

- Madcap Melee Mayhem
Master creative combos, wield wacky weapons, use your surroundings to your advantage and conquer the chaos!

- Power Up!
Spend your hard-earned coins to customize your fighter! Equip special items and upgrade your stats to create a unique build for every playthrough!

- New Anamanaguchi Music
Known for their explosive blend of 8-bit energy and hyper-melodic rock, the band returns to their roots with all new music crafted for this Toronto-hopping adventure.

- 4-Player Co-Op Mayhem
Join forces with up to three friends, locally or online, with easy drop-in/drop-out co-op. Battle solo or hit the streets together.
70010000093467.intro: Join Scott Pilgrim and Ramona Flowers in a brand-new brawling adventure across space, time, and the streets of Toronto!
70010000093467.name: Scott Pilgrim EX

70010000114998.description:
Get ready for an underground adventure full of charm and strategy! In Mole Cart Mining, you guide a determined little mole riding a mine cart while rotating tracks on a hexagonal grid to create the perfect route. The goal is simple and satisfying: collect every mineral and reach the exit in style.

Each level is a tiny puzzle filled with classic pieces like straights, curves, and junctions, plus the game’s chaotic star, the rotating conveyor, which spins automatically when the cart crosses it. It changes everything mid-route and demands smart planning that mixes order, timing, and a bit of underground boldness.

With 30 handcrafted levels split between the Iron Mines and Diamond Mines, the game offers short, clean, relaxing challenges with clear objectives. Every solution brings that genuine “aha!” moment when everything clicks into place.

Mole Cart Mining is perfect for fans of clever puzzles, smart routes, and that satisfying feeling of watching the mole slide along exactly the path you planned. No frustration here, just good ideas, good tracks, and plenty of mining fun.
70010000114998.intro: Clever Tracks in the Little Mole Mines
70010000114998.name: Mole Cart Mining

70010000116462.description:
Are you clever enough to clear the streets? Avenue Escape is a puzzle game that challenges you to direct traffic jams and safely move cars through busy cityscapes! Each of Avenue Escape’s 50 levels features a bustling scene packed with cars, pedestrians and traffic lights. It’s up to you to figure out the perfect sequence to move every vehicle to its destination.

Think ahead, time your moves carefully and avoid accidents as you navigate tricky intersections and unpredictable crosswalks. Try to clear each stage in the fewest lives possible, but don’t worry too much, as levels can be tried as many times as it takes.

• Engage in top-town puzzle gameplay across 50 unique levels!
• Safely direct vehicles to their destinations.
• Think ahead and strategically choose the correct sequence.
• Clear levels using as few “lives” as possible.
• Enjoy casual gameplay and cute graphics.
70010000116462.intro: Bring order to the urban chaos as you solve traffic jams in brainteasing puzzle action!
70010000116462.name: Avenue Escape

70010000081791.description:
Presenting The Last Ninja Collection + Bonus Games (International Karate, IK+ and Bangkok Knights). Known for its innovative gameplay, memorable graphics, atmospheric music and blockbusting reviews, our Last Ninja series captivated gamers the world over and set a new standard for action-adventure games. This collection brings together the entire Last Ninja series of C64 versions along with Amiga and Spectrum versions, where available, for the first time. These games pushed the boundaries of what was possible with the technology of the time and now they are available to play on Nintendo Switch™.

The Last Ninja (C64)
Navigate through beautifully hand-crafted environments, solve puzzles and engage in combat with a variety of enemies. The Last Ninja was not only a global commercial success but also a critical one, earning numerous awards, including ‘Game of the Year,’ ‘Best 8-Bit Graphics,’ and ‘Best Music Soundtrack’. The series sold over 23 million copies, cementing its place as one of the most influential and best-selling titles of the 8-bit computer gaming era.

Last Ninja 2 (C64, Spectrum and Amiga)
A landmark title in action-adventure gaming, the Last Ninja 2 featured atmospheric, isometric environments. Its detailed graphics, immersive soundtracks, and challenging gameplay captivated both players and critics, earning multiple awards, including Game of the Year, as well as accolades for its outstanding graphics and sound. It became the most successful entry in the Last Ninja trilogy.

Last Ninja 3 (C64 and Amiga)
Holds a special place in retro video game history, not only for its innovative gameplay and stunning visuals of its time, but also for being the first computer game to receive a perfect 100% review score.

Ninja Remix (C64 and Amiga)
A special edition that enhances the original experience with new soundtracks, updated graphics and gameplay tweaks.

International Karate (Spectrum and C64)
This classic fighting game set the standard for martial arts games in the 1980s. It was also the first European-developed game to receive a CES Showcase Innovations Award at the 1986 Chicago event and won many other awards.

IK+ (C64, Spectrum and Amiga)
